name: Quantyzd, Inc.
description: Developer of a no-code testing software designed to facilitate dashboard functionality testing for mobile application development. The company's software uses artificial intelligence-based trainable robots to focus on iterative application development, manages a portfolio of applications and understands how to stack up against the competition, enabling mobile application developers to test, deploy and monitor performance, reliability, functionality and user experience.
one_liner: Developer of a no-code testing software designed to facilitate dashboard functionality testing for mobile application development. The company's software uses artificial intelligence-based trainable robots to focus on iterative application development, manages a portfolio of applications and understands how to stack up against the competition, enabling mobile application developers to test, deploy and monitor performance, reliability, functionality and user experience.
